chapter.title: Presentation
chapter.para: Presentation is the key to any Control Point software interface and ohNet has been developed with this in mind. The entire OpenHome ethos is to remove the focus from developing access to a device's services to allow you to spend all of your available time focused on what matters for you and your customer â€” user interface.
The Presentation layer is not directly supported or discussed in this document, but ohNet greatly supports the development of user interfaces for use at the Presentation layer.
